custom-meta.meta-value: Data cannot be shared publicly because of privacy concerns. Data are available from the Illinois Department of Public Health Institutional Data Access / Ethics Committee, which has imposed these restrictions for researchers who meet the criteria for access to confidential data. Contact Megan Patel, Megan.Patel@illinois.gov (Surveillance and Informatics Epidemiologist in the Office of Health Protection, Division of Infectious Disease), for information about data access.
